thread.title: Phone.com on Inc. 5000 for Fourth Year in a Row
thread.title_full: Phone.com on Inc. 5000 for Fourth Year in a Row

author: admin
title: Phone.com on Inc. 5000 for Fourth Year in a Row
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 7:00 AM   Phone.com 
NEWARK, N.J., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Phone.com, a leading cloud-based phone service for small businesses and entrepreneurs, today announced that the company has been named to the prestigious Inc. 5000 list for a fourth year in a row. 
The Inc. 5000 is a listing of the nation's fastest-growing private companies, and assigns ranking based on percentage revenue growth over a four-year period. The list represents a comprehensive snapshot of a key segment of the U.S. economy--America's independent entrepreneurs. 
"We're honored to be recognized along with other young companies that are changing the face of business in the United States," said Phone.com CEO Ari Rabban. "What I value most, being part of the Inc. 5000, is that it shows we are performing and growing consistently over the years." 
Rabban added that the award speaks to the tenacity of a handful of companies in the telephony space. "Cloud-based phone service is a growing market, of course, but it is also a very tough and competitive one. We believe Phone.com's ongoing success can be attributed to offering an outstanding product at the best possible price, and giving our customers exceptional service year in, year out." 
The 2015 Inc. 5000 rank is based on percentage revenue growth when comparing 2011 to 2014. Companies must be U.S. based, privately held, for profit and independent, not subsidiaries or divisions of other companies. 
"The story of this year's Inc. 5000 is the story of great leadership," says Inc. President and Editor-In-Chief Eric Schurenberg. "In an incredibly competitive business landscape, it takes something extraordinary to take your company to the top." 
Ari Rabban said that Phone.com expects to continue on a steady growth course. "We're constantly innovating, adapting to changes in the market and in the landscape of technology, which has many twists and turns. We plan to be on this road for a long time to come." 
The 2015 Inc. 5000 list is available online at http://www.inc.com/5000 
ABOUT Phone.com 
Phone.com is the leading cloud communications and business phone service for small businesses and entrepreneurs. We offer flexible, cost-effective solutions and award-winning customer support to more than 25,000 customers across the United States. Innovative business VoIP solutions, intelligent call handling, toll-free numbers and virtual phone numbers--all starting at under $10 /month. Connect with us on Facebook , follow us on Twitter , or talk to us in person at 800-842-3394. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/phonecom-on-inc-5000-for-fourth-year-in-a-row-300138302.html 
SOURCE Phone.com
